"Oh, what are you doing here?": "Checking up on you."
"Came to visit Garoa."
"Oh, I see."
"I come here every once in a while."
"Thanks, that means a lot."
"I come here every once in a while too."
"I tell him what's been going on and stuff."

"I tell him all that's happened so far,
or whatever it is I plan to do that day."

"It's gotten more relaxing to talk to him like that
while I tidy up the area."
"And then, I start thinking about the past..."

"Like my first day of Photon Gliding training,
when I got caught in a tree and couldn't come down."

"Like the day I tried chasing after some Tames,
and before I knew it, I had no idea where I was."

"Dad was beyond furious when he
rushed on over and found me that day."

"He was like \"Do you know how dangerous it is
to wander off where nobody can see you?!\""
"The other villagers practically had to pull him away from me sometimes."

"They'd worry, they'd encourage,
or they'd complain to Dad about something..."

"Back then, I hated that sort of
\"special treatment\" I got."
"...But now I know it was just because they cared about me so much."
"Now that they're gone... Now that Dad's gone..."
"...I miss all of it."
"Aina..."
"...Are you okay?"
"...I'm okay."

"I have to make sure I cherish
the life they've given me."
"...Yeah. I'm okay."

"My whole life is ahead of me, after all.
I've gotta keep moving forward."
"Well, I guess I'll take care of today's report."
"Wanna come?"
